amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit commercial banks from charging a fee to the depositor of a check that is returned for insufficient funds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 108-439 to prohibit commercial banks from charging a fee to the depositor of a check that is returned for insufficient funds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weiner amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 255 (Roll no. 66).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Weiner.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Weiner amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 255 (Roll no. 66).
